text: The following lists events that happened in 1939 in Iceland. ==Incumbents== *Monarch - Kristján X *Prime Minister - Hermann Jónasson ==Events== * Iceland in World War II ==Births== Jón Baldvin Hannibalsson *21 February - Jón Baldvin Hannibalsson, politician and diplomat *14 July - Rúnar Guðmannsson, footballer *27 September - Guðrún Kristín Magnúsdóttir, artist and writer *7 November - Eiður Svanberg Guðnason, politician. ==Deaths== ==References== Category:1930s in Iceland Iceland Iceland Category:Years of the 20th century in Iceland
title: 1939 in Iceland
